audio module¶

class audio.Audio(app)[source]¶

Bases: object

The audio class handles playback of audio links stored within the eTree meta-data set.

It primarily utilizes FFMPEG to handle the decoding of the audio into a byte-stream, which may then be piped into a PyAudio instance and played to the user, all within a seperate thread from the main application thread loop.

change_play_state()[source]¶

Either starts of resumes playback of the currently set track URL.

Class instance.

Creates an FFMPEG sub-process to handling audio decoding, while emitting relevant meta-data to the main application thread as necessary.

self : instance
Class instance.
url : str
The URL of the audio link we wish to play.
kwargs : {}
Dictionary of signals which emit to the main application thread.
